subject: Re: Re: Pedal plate missing
description_text:
Hello, i still haven't received the pedal plate or any tracking information
on the delivery, could you make sure it is on the way?

A terça, 20/05/2025, 03:36, support@simsonn.com <support@simsonn.com>
escreveu:

>
> Hello! We are very sorry for the inconvenience! After verification, our
> warehouse colleagues accidentally missed the bottom plate during delivery.
> We have urgently arranged to resend it and will send it to you today. Thank
> you for your understanding and support!
> ------------------------------
> support@simsonn.com
>
>
> *From:* Filipe Cunha <feg2k18@gmail.com>
> *Date:* 2025-05-20 10:17
> *To:* support <support@simsonn.com>
> *Subject:* Re: Pedal plate missing
> Order #SSN1461
>
>
> A terça, 20/05/2025, 02:58, support@simsonn.com <support@simsonn.com>
> escreveu:
>
>>
>> Hello, can you help with the order number?
>>
>> ------------------------------
>> support@simsonn.com
>>
>>
>> *From:* Filipe Cunha <feg2k18@gmail.com>
>> *Date:* 2025-05-19 23:35
>> *To:* support <support@simsonn.com>
>> *Subject:* Pedal plate missing
>> Hello, i just recieved the pedals i ordered but the pedal plate did not
>> arrive, i would like to know what happened and how can we fix the issue
>>
>> Thank you
>>
>>

conversations.body_text:
Hello, i would like to know if the problem has been checked and if the
product has been shipped, i did receive and email but i still have no
tracking code or any confirmation.

Thank you

A quarta, 4/06/2025, 00:49, support@simsonn.com
Hi Filipe Cunha,     Here is the SF International tracking number. The package was shipped on June 7th.  SF3172442478434
